Red Squirrel

Creature - Squirrel

Red squirrels can be right or left handed when they eat a pine cone!

  • Scientific Name: Sciurus vulgaris
  • Average Size: 21cm
  • Average Lifespan: 3 years
  • Habitat: Boreal, coniferous woodland

With their striking red coats and the fluffiest tales in all the forest, the red squirrel is distinctly recognisable when scampering around woodland throughout Europe.
